name: CLKComplicationTemplateGraphicCornerGaugeView
desc: A template for displaying a SwiftUI view and a gauge in the clock face’s corner.

items.name: init(gaugeProvider: CLKGaugeProvider, leadingTextProvider: CLKTextProvider?, trailingTextProvider: CLKTextProvider?, label: Label)
items.desc: Creates a new template with the provided gauge and view.

items.name: var label: Label
items.desc: The SwiftUI view displayed by the template.

items.name: var gaugeProvider: CLKGaugeProvider
items.desc: The gauge to display in the complication.

items.name: var leadingTextProvider: CLKTextProvider?
items.desc: The text provider for the gauge’s leading text.

items.name: var trailingTextProvider: CLKTextProvider?
items.desc: The text provider for the gauge’s trailing text.

declaration: final class CLKComplicationTemplateGraphicCornerGaugeView<Label> : CLKComplicationTemplate where Label : View
